p: The dihydrochalcone 3′- O-β- d-glucopyranosyl α,4,2′,4′,6′-pentahydroxy–dihydrochalcone isolated from Eysenhardtia polystachya was able to protect mice against diabetic nephropathy. It improved renal dysfunction as well as it reduced glycated hemoglobin and advanced glycation end products in the presence of significant histological recovery of kidney [ 2].
